name: Thorin Oakenshield

background.name: Hermit
background.description: You lived in seclusion either in a sheltered community such as a monastery, or entirely alone, for a formative part of your life. In your time apart from the clamor of society, you found quiet, solitude, and perhaps some of the answers you were looking for.
equipment: scroll case stuffed full of notes from your studies or prayers

personalityTraits: I connect everything that happens to me to a grand, cosmic plan.
I am utterly serene, even in the face of disaster.
ideal: Inner Peace. I am content as long as I am allowed to live my life dedicated to my religious studies and observances.
bond: I entered seclusion to hide from the ones who might still be hunting me. I must someday confront them.
flaw: I am dogmatic in my thoughts and philosophy.
backstory: Born into a distinguished family of divine healers, I left the comfort of my home to seek solitude and understanding in the mountains, meditating on the complexities of life and the divine.
equipment: scroll case stuffed full of notes from your studies or prayers
